channel.title: Need help fast (Hosting)
channel.description:
Hello then i should join my server i just cant.
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/acwgt0.jpg[/img]
i using no-ip.org and i have opning my brandwith ports and router ports so idk why it dont works it works if i use 127.0.0.1 with the client so i dont think its the client. plz help!

item.title: Need help fast (Hosting)
item.dc:creator: @il_pwn_il il pwn il
item.description:
@il_pwn_il wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:2, topic:350211"]Mabye it’s something to do with Ipannel or mabye its only alowing the ip 127.0.0.1, Idk 100% just a guess :)[/quote] k ty u know how to take out the ipannel?
